headline: Consumer sector is a 'better barometer' than Nvidia
summary: Investors weigh what's next for the market, searching for signals that the sell-off has either hit a bottom or has further to fall. Marketgauge.com chief strategist Michele Schneider joins Morning Brief to explain her "vanity trade" strategy, and says the consumer sector is a "better barometer" for investors to monitor than mega-cap names like Nvidia (NVDA). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
